sentences.sContent: The Oriental in Bangkok is the apotheosis of the grand hotel.
sentences.sCn: 曼谷的东方酒店是大饭店的典范。

synos.tran: 神化；崇拜，颂扬；尊奉为神

remMethod.val: apo (离开， 远离) + the (神) + osis → 离神不远 → 神化

trans.tranCn: 尊为神， 神话； 典范
trans.tranOther: If something is the apotheosis of something else, it is an ideal or typical example of it
